tuv.seg: CervicalCheck: The National Cervical Screening Programme
CervicalCheck: An Clár Scagthástála Ceirbheacs Náisiúnta
CervicalCheck is a national screening programme to prevent and control cervical cancer
Clár náisiúnta scagthástála is ea CervicalCheck chun cosc a chur ar ailse cheirbheacsach agus í a rialú
The programme provides smear tests to women between the ages of 25 and 60
Soláthraíonn an clár tástálacha smeartha do mhná idir aois 25 agus 60 bliain
A smear test is a simple procedure that only takes minutes and is the most effective way to detect changes in the cells of the cervix
Gnáthamh simplí is ea tástáil smeartha nach nglacann ach cúpla nóiméad agus is é an bealach is éifeachtaí chun athruithe atá tagtha ar chillíní an cheirbheacs a bhrath
The programme is voluntary and you are free to choose not to take part
Clár deonach is ea é, is fútsa atá sé a roghnú gan páirt a ghlacadh ann
If you have any concerns regarding cervical cancer, have a family history of cervical cancer or have symptoms you are worried about, you should contact your family doctor (GP)

Má tá aon bhuarthaí ort maidir le hailse cheirbheacsach, má tá stair d’ailse cheirbheacsach i do mhuintir nó má tá comharthaí agat a bhfuil tú buartha fúthu, ba cheart duit teagmháil a dhéanamh le do dhochtúir teaghlaigh (DG)
CervicalCheck provides free smear tests to women aged 25 to 60 who are resident in the Republic of Ireland
Soláthraíonn CervicalCheck tástálacha smeartha saor in aisce do mhná idir aois 25 agus 60 bliain a bhfuil cónaí orthu i bPoblacht na hÉireann
Women outside of the eligibility guidelines
Mná lasmuigh de na treoirlínte incháilitheachta
Although CervicalCheck normally provides free smear tests only to women aged 25 to 60, there are a number of exceptions to the screening age including women who:
Cé gur gnách nach soláthraíonn CervicalCheck tástálacha smeartha saor in aisce ach do mhná idir aois 25 agus 60 bliain, tá roinnt eisceachtaí ann i leith na haoise scagthástála, ina measc:
• Are over 60 years of age and have never had a smear test
• Mná atá os cionn aois 60 bliain nár thug faoi thástáil smeartha riamh
• Have attended a colposcopy service and require follow-up
• Mná a d’fhreastail ar sheirbhís ionscópachta ar an drólann agus a dteastaíonn coinne leantach uathu
• Have had or are about to have an organ transplant
• Mná a ndearnadh trasphlandú orgáin orthu nó atá ar tí tabhairt faoi thrasphlandú orgáin
• Are on renal dialysis
• Mná a bhfuil scagdhealú duánach á dhéanamh orthu
If you are aged between 25 and 60 and have never had a CervicalCheck smear test you can simply make an appointment with a registered GP practice or clinic
Má tá tú idir 25 agus 60 bliain d’aois agus murar tugadh faoi thástáil smeartha CervicalCheck ort riamh roimhe seo, ní gá duit ach coinne a dhéanamh le cleachtas nó clinic cláraithe DG
A letter of invitation is not needed to make an appointment and attend for a first CervicalCheck smear test
Ní theastaíonn litir chuiridh chun coinne a dhéanamh agus chun freastal ar do chéad tástáil smeartha CervicalCheck
To arrange a smear test you can contact a registered smeartaker of your choice to make an appointment
Chun tástáil smeartha a shocrú, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le do rogha glacadóir smeartha chun coinne a dhéanamh

Thousands of GPs, practice nurses, and women's health, family planning and Well Woman clinics all over Ireland are registered and you can see a full list in the Find a Smeartaker section of CervicalCheck or by calling CervicalCheck on Freephone 1800 45 45 55

Tá na mílte DG, altra cleachtais, clinic sláinte ban, pleanála clainne agus clinic Well Woman ar fud na hÉireann go léir cláraithe agus féadfaidh tú teacht ar liosta iomlán díobh sa mhír Aimsigh Glacadóir Smeartha de chuid CervicalCheck nó trí ghlao ar CervicalCheck ar Shaorghlao 1800 45 45 55
CervicalCheck also sends invitation letters to women who are on the CervicalCheck register
Anuas air sin, seolann CervicalCheck litreacha cuiridh do mhná atá ar chlár CervicalCheck
You can check online whether you are on the register or call CervicalCheck on Freephone 1800 45 45 55
Féadfaidh tú seiceáil ar líne an bhfuil tú ar an gclár nó glao ar CervicalCheck ar Shaorghlao 1800 45 45 55
To register by post, download the self-registration form (pdf)
Chun clárú sa phost, íoslódáil an fhoirm féinchláraithe (pdf)
Women who have already had a CervicalCheck smear test will be automatically re-called by letter when their next smear test is due

Déanfar mná ar tugadh faoi thástáil smeartha CervicalCheck orthu cheana féin a athghairm go huathoibríoch trí litir a sheoladh chucu ina luaitear cathain a bheidh a gcéad tástáil smeartha eile le déanamh
CervicalCheck has produced a number of information leaflets which provide simple information on cervical screening and what to expect when you go for your smear test

Sholáthair CervicalCheck roinnt bileoga faisnéise a sholáthraíonn faisnéis neamhchasta ar scagthástáil cheirbheacsach agus ar an méid ar cheart duit coinne a bheith agat leis nuair a thugann tú faoi do thástáil smeartha
In addition, they have a list of frequently asked questions, which will help answer many of the common questions regarding cervical screening
Anuas air sin, tá liosta acu de cheisteanna coitianta, a chabhróidh leat go leor de na ceisteanna coitianta a bhaineann le scagthástáil cheirbheacsach a fhreagairt
The National Cervical Screening Programme
Urlár Uachtarach Sciathán Thiar ó Dheas
The Irish Cancer Society has information booklets on a number of topics, including Cervical Smear Test Results (pdf)
Tá leabhráin eolais ag Cumann Ailse na hÉireann maidir le roinnt ábhair, agus Torthaí na Scagthástála Ceirbheacs (pdf) san áireamh
